QAPair.Question: What is (are) Gram stain of urethral discharge ?
QAPair.Answer: A Gram stain of urethral discharge is a test used to identify bacteria in fluid from the tube that drains urine from the bladder (urethra).

QAPair.Question: Who is at risk for Gram stain of urethral discharge? ?
What to do for Gram stain of urethral discharge ?
QAPair.Answer: A culture of the specimen ( urethral discharge culture ) should be performed in addition to the Gram stain. More advanced tests (such as PCR tests) may also be done.
